# delete(_:)

**Instance Method**

Deletes the items with the specified identifiers, and any of their child items, from the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func delete(_ items: [ItemIdentifierType])
```

## Removing items

- **deleteAll()**: Deletes all of the items from the section snapshot.

items.description: Deletes all of the items from the section snapshot.
items.name: deleteAll()

title: delete(_:)
